mapper.select: SELECT SUM(OP.ORD_PRICE) AS "TOTAL_INCOME" FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN ORDER_PRO OP ON (SI.STO_NUM=OP.STO_NUM) JOIN JUMUN J ON (OP.ORD_NUM=J.ORD_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} AND J.ORD_STATUS='배달완료'
SELECT COUNT(OP.ORD_PRICE) AS "TOTAL_ORDER" FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN ORDER_PRO OP ON (SI.STO_NUM=OP.STO_NUM) JOIN JUMUN J ON (OP.ORD_NUM=J.ORD_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} AND J.ORD_STATUS='배달완료'
SELECT AVG(SR.REV_RATE) AS "AVG_RATE" FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON (SI.STO_NUM=SR.STO_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(SL.STO_NUM) AS "STO_LIKES" FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN STORE_LIKE SL ON (SI.STO_NUM=SL.STO_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT COUNT(M.MENU_NUM) AS "TOTAL_CHICKEN" FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN ORDER_PRO OP ON (SI.STO_NUM=OP.STO_NUM) JOIN JUMUN_DETAIL JD ON (OP.ORD_NUM=JD.ORD_NUM) JOIN MENU M ON (JD.MENU_NUM=M.MENU_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} AND (M.CAT_CODE='1' OR M.CAT_CODE='2')

SELECT ROWNUM R, N.MENU_NAME, T.MENU_COUNT FROM(SELECT COUNT(M.MENU_NUM) AS "MENU_COUNT", M.MENU_NUM FROM MENU M JOIN BRAND B ON (M.BRAND_CODE=B.BRAND_CODE) JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON (B.BRAND_CODE=SI.BRAND_CODE) JOIN JUMUN_DETAIL JD ON (M.MENU_NUM=JD.MENU_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} AND (M.CAT_CODE='1' OR M.CAT_CODE='2') GROUP BY M.MENU_NUM ORDER BY MENU_COUNT DESC) T JOIN MENU N ON N.MENU_NUM = T.MENU_NUM WHERE ROWNUM < =3

SELECT COUNT(J.ORD_NUM) AS "CUSTOMER",TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PAY_DATE),'YYYY-MM') AS "PAY_DATE", SUM(PAY_TOAL) AS "PAY_TOTAL" FROM PAYMENT p JOIN JUMUN J ON (P.ORD_NUM= J.ORD_NUM) JOIN ORDER_PRO OP ON (J.ORD_NUM=OP.ORD_NUM) JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON (OP.STO_NUM=SI.STO_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} AND J.ORD_STATUS='배달완료' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PAY_DATE),'YYYY-MM')

SELECT ROWNUM R, N.MENU_NAME, T.MENU_COUNT FROM( SELECT COUNT(M.MENU_NUM) AS "MENU_COUNT", M.MENU_NUM FROM MENU M JOIN BRAND B ON (M.BRAND_CODE=B.BRAND_CODE) JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON (B.BRAND_CODE=SI.BRAND_CODE) JOIN JUMUN_DETAIL JD ON (M.MENU_NUM=JD.MENU_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} AND (M.CAT_CODE='4' OR M.CAT_CODE='5') GROUP BY M.MENU_NUM ORDER BY MENU_COUNT DESC) T JOIN MENU N ON N.MENU_NUM = T.MENU_NUM WHERE ROWNUM < =3

SELECT ROWNUM AS "ROWNUM",T.VIP_COUNT, T.VIP_NAME FROM(SELECT COUNT(J.USER_ID) AS "VIP_COUNT", J.USER_ID AS "VIP_NAME" FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN ORDER_PRO OP ON (SI.STO_NUM=OP.STO_NUM) JOIN JUMUN J ON (OP.ORD_NUM=J.ORD_NUM) WHERE SI.USER_ID='bbq1' GROUP BY J.USER_ID ORDER BY VIP_COUNT DESC) T WHERE ROWNUM < =5
